title: The Opioid Conspiracy And Driving Get Deadlier 10.19.17
itunes:title: The Opioid Conspiracy And Driving Get Deadlier 10.19.17
description:
In episode 9, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Edgar Momplaisir to discuss how cars have become deadlier, Trump's soldier bias, the opioid crisis of America, Amazon's new potential headquarters, Gordon Hayward's leg, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
